detail_desc: Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with gathers at the back and a detachable tie belt with D-rings. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with gathers at the back and a detachable tie belt with D-rings. Unlined.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Short dress in satin with a sheen. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and pleats at the front, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined bodice.

STUDIO COLLECTION/PREMUM QUALITY. Double-breasted, ankle-length trenchcoat woven in a wool blend with notch lapels, front pockets with decorative stitching, and an inner pocket. Detachable belt at the waist that goes through the pocket opening and can be fastened both inside and out. Gentle flare to the hem and a single back vent. Lined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 23 pairs of studs and two pairs of hoops. size from 0.2 cm to 1.8 cm.

3-piece set with a shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave and a satin bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with concealed elastication and a button at the waist, a zip fly, front pockets and a fake back pocket. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details. Bow tie with a narrow, adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.

3-piece set with a shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave and a satin bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with concealed elastication and a button at the waist, a zip fly, front pockets and a fake back pocket. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details. Bow tie with a narrow, adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave and accessories. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Detachable, adjustable braces with imitation leather details.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave and accessories. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Detachable, adjustable braces with imitation leather details.
Earrings in various designs. 22 pairs of small studs, one pair of hoop earrings and two pairs with pendants. Size from 0.2 cm to 3.5 cm.

Padded jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood that is elasticated around the edges. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front and chin guard at the top. Flap side pockets with a button, seam at the top with a small frill trim and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in fleece.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a high collar, large buttons over the shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper can also be worn as a gilet by unbuttoning the sleeves.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a high collar, large buttons over the shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper can also be worn as a gilet by unbuttoning the sleeves.
Earrings in embossed metal with square pendants. Length approx. 4 cm.
Calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a concealed zip in one side and high slit at the front. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a concealed zip in one side and high slit at the front. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a sheen. Turtle neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a sheen. Turtle neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Cardigan in chunky-knit, soft wool with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in chunky-knit, soft wool with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in soft, gently draping viscose twill with contrasting colour seams. Collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
KELZUKI x H&M. Padded jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, chunky-knit alpaca blend with a fluffy finish. High, ribbed collar, a zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft, chunky-knit alpaca blend with a fluffy finish. High, ribbed collar, a zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shirt in softly draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in softly draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves, a visible zip down the back and a seam under the bust. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves, a visible zip down the back and a seam under the bust. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top, long sleeves and a gathered seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt. Lined over the bust.

Top in soft jersey with a small frill around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocking across the chest, a seam below the bust and long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch jersey with tapered legs and short slits at the hems. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a shimmering finish. V-neck with narrow ties at the neckline and voluminous puff sleeves that end with narrow elastication. Waist with a seam at the front and elastication at the back, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Playsuit in glossy satin with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an opening at the back with a covered button.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a cotton blend. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a zip fly and buttons, diagonal side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and tapered legs.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a cotton blend. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a zip fly and buttons, diagonal side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and tapered legs.
Metal earrings, one pair with plastic beads. Diameter from 2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 2.2 cm.
Trainers with imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Trainers with imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Block-coloured polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Block-coloured polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with side pockets. Unlined.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a button at the top and a floral lining.
Hi-tops in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Hi-tops in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Hi-tops in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Calf-length dress in patterned, semi-transparent mesh with a round neckline and long sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and a flared, softly draping skirt. Lined with a soft jersey underdress that has narrow shoulder straps.
Short, stretchy skirt in jacquard-patterned jersey with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy, and a short slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch denim-look jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Treggings in stretch denim-look jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
One-shoulder body in sturdy jersey with one narrow shoulder strap with a metal detail at one end, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top.
One-shoulder body in sturdy jersey with one narrow shoulder strap with a metal detail at one end, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. One top with a jersey-lined hood, both with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Fitted jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
